page.title: 02Health Thornley Knowle Green
page.content:
There are no actual health centres or surgeries within this area. Longridge Health Centre situated in the small town bordering the area was opened in 1971.
Five doctors operate a rota for visiting patients or are available if the patient is able to visit the centre. There are two clinic nurses able to treat minor ailments at the centre and 4 district nurses, 2 S.R.N. and 2 S.E.N., and 4 Health Visitors also make domicilliary visits. Other facilities include a School Clinic and Dental serivce, chiropody and ante-natal and post-natal care. There are three doctors and a nurse operating the same system at another surgery in the town. There are two dental surgeries in the town covering private and N.H.S. patients.
